item.title: Install Kubeflow Pipelines for Elyra on Linux + Minikube.
item.description: In my quest to find the perfect MLOps workflow to accelerate my financial ML research, I played around with Elyra. It’s a set of plugins for Jupyter Notebooks that allows you to visually drag and drop a (Python) pipeline. To use the Kubeflow pipelines feature I needed to install Kubeflow Pipelines on my local machine. The Elyra documentation on this uses Docker Desktop for MacOS or Windows. As my machine is running Pop!
